original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Josiah, and his goodness, according to that which was written in the law of the Lord,
korean_text: 요시야의 남은 사적과 여호와의 율법에 기록된 대로 행한 모든 선한 일과

sentences.original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Josiah,
according to that which was written
in the law of the Lord,
